title: Perform manual testing and edge case validation
description: Perform comprehensive manual E2E testing of complete flow. Test edge cases (missing replied message, broken media URLs, invalid attachments). Test responsive behavior on mobile, tablet, desktop. Test accessibility with screen reader and keyboard-only navigation. Performance test with many attachments. Verify database migration and no console errors.
dod: Manual test: View message with replied message - QuotedMessage renders correctly
Manual test: View message with single attachment - thumbnail renders and modal opens
Manual test: View message with multiple attachments - all render, navigation works
Manual test: View message with reply + attachments - both render correctly
Edge case: Replied message deleted - shows 'unavailable' placeholder
Edge case: Broken media URL - fallback UI appears
Edge case: Invalid attachment data - handled gracefully
Responsive: Test on mobile (< 640px) - components responsive
Responsive: Test on tablet (640-1024px) - layout correct
Responsive: Test on desktop (> 1024px) - full features work
Accessibility: Screen reader announces modal and buttons
Accessibility: Keyboard-only navigation works (Tab, Arrow keys, ESC)
Performance: Load message with 10+ attachments - no lag
Database: Migration runs successfully on test database
Browser: No errors or warnings in console
All acceptance criteria verified as passing
